about_the_game:
Build a cozy town for your heroes to call home with the Summerwind Saga - Village pack! ELV Games is here with a set of tiles ready to create villages for your heroes to live in and visit. This pack’s A2 ground tiles and 29 B sheets can make a bunch of buildings that you can decorate to match your vision!

Normal and snow-covered versions of each house tile makes it simple to show changing seasons with the buildings themselves, or make sure that a village hidden deep in the snowy mountains is properly coated with fluffy snow. Each tileset sheet also comes in 32x32px and 48x48px-sized versions, so you can easily use them in Ace, MV/MZ, or your favorite engine! Pick up the Summerwind Saga - Village pack and give your heroes a nice place to return to after hours of adventuring and foraging!


Contents:

- Fully customizable houses
- 2 Season tilesets (Normal/Winter)
- Playground props, wood fences, wood piles, boxes, treasure chests, house banners and windows, chimneys, plus more!
- Every tiles position match the other season tiles!
